class.name: GKAccessPoint
class.brief_description: Controls the Game Center access point overlay.
class.description: The access point displays a control in a corner of your game that opens a Game Center dashboard when the player taps or clicks it. Use the [member GameCenterManager.access_point] property to get the shared access point object, then configure its [member location], [member active], and other properties.

method.name: trigger
method.description: Displays the Game Center dashboard as if the player taps or presses the access point. [param done] is called (with no arguments) when the dashboard presentation completes or is dismissed.

method.name: trigger_with_achievement
method.description: Displays the Game Center dashboard in a state that shows a specific achievement. [param done] is called (with no arguments) when the dashboard presentation completes or is dismissed. Only available on macOS 15, iOS 18, tvOS 14, and visionOS 1; earlier versions perform no action.

method.name: trigger_with_leaderboard
method.description: Displays the Game Center dashboard in a state that shows a specific leaderboard. Use [enum GKLeaderboard.PlayerScope] for [param playerScope] and [enum GKLeaderboard.TimeScope] for [param timeScope]. [param done] is called (with no arguments) when the dashboard presentation completes or is dismissed. Only available on macOS 15, iOS 18, tvOS 14, and visionOS 1; earlier versions perform no action.

method.name: trigger_with_leaderboard_set
method.description: Displays the Game Center dashboard in a state that shows a specific leaderboard set. [param done] is called (with no arguments) when the dashboard presentation completes or is dismissed. Only available on macOS 15, iOS 18, tvOS 14, and visionOS 1; earlier versions perform no action.

method.name: trigger_with_player
method.description: Displays the Game Center dashboard in a state that shows a player profile. [param done] is called (with no arguments) when the dashboard presentation completes or is dismissed. Only available on macOS 15, iOS 18, tvOS 14, and visionOS 1; earlier versions perform no action.

method.name: trigger_with_state
method.description: Displays the Game Center dashboard in the specified state. See [enum GKGameCenterViewController.State] for values. [param done] is called (with no arguments) when the dashboard presentation completes or is dismissed.
